shortDescription: The web administrative portal in Zhone zNID 2426A before S3.0.501 allows remote authenticated users to bypass intended access restrictions via a modified server response, related to an insecure direct object reference.
vulnerabilityName: dasanzhone znid_2426a_firmware Authorization Bypass Through User-Controlled Key
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
